Ready to Hack the Future? Join 237HackFest!.

Whether you're a coder, problem solver, or tech enthusiast, this is your chance to showcase your skills, collaborate with brilliant minds, and build game-changing solutions. 237HackFest kicks off on May 02-03, 2025—are you in?

⏳ Registration closes on April 25, 2025! Don’t wait—secure your spot before it’s too late!
